Package org.openhab.core.thing.i18n

Class ChannelTypeI18nLocalizationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.core.thing.i18n.ChannelTypeI18nLocalizationService
  • @NonNullByDefault
public class ChannelTypeI18nLocalizationService
extends java.lang.Object
    This OSGi service could be used to localize a ChannelType using the I18N mechanism of the openHAB framework.
    Author:
    Markus Rathgeb - Initial contribution, Markus Rathgeb - Move code from XML thing type provider to separate service, Laurent Garnier - fix localized label and description for channel group definition, Christoph Weitkamp - factored out from XmlChannelTypeProvider and XmlChannelGroupTypeProvider, Henning Treu - factored out from ThingTypeI18nLocalizationService
